blog.title: Making My Site Discoverable - SEO, Webmentions, and a Traffic Spike
blog.description: I overhauled my site's SEO with Schema.org markup and replaced Giscus comments with Webmentions. The timing coincided with a surprising 200% traffic increase. Here's what I learned about making content discoverable.
